The Climate Action Act of 2015 (CAP 54324), establishes the main legal framework for climate change mitigation and adaptation in Malta.
The Act requires the periodic preparation of a Low Carbon Development Strategy and a National Adaptation Strategy and provides for regular review and updating of these strategies.
